A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney have just taken a massive dump all over George Lucas' creation. The real Star Wars ended in 2005 with Revenge of the Sith. This new trilogy is a joke. Luke has went from facing off against two of the most powerful sith ever\, all by himself\, to hiding like a scared little wimp on a random island whilst milking a large alien. Not even sure how he discovered that one
